metadata.title: CVE-2017-17718 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The Net::LDAP (aka net-ldap) gem before 0.16.0 for Ruby has Missing SSLCertificate Validation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17718` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-net-ldap - 0.16.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-net-ldap package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.16.1-1').
